nodes.text: Gregory Everett "Greg" Proops (born October 3, 1959), best known for his improvisational comedy on the first two incarnations of TV's Whose Line is it Anyway?, was the voice of Fode in Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace, the video game spin-offs Star Wars Episode I: Racer and Kinect Star Wars, and LEGO Star Wars: The Freemaker Adventures episode seven, "Race on Tatooine." He voiced another race announcer, Jak Sivrak, in Star Wars Resistance. Proops also voiced the character of Tal Merrik in The Clone Wars Season Two. He currently works with Yahoo! News and hosts a podcast called The Smartest Man in the World.
